title: LEGO 2K Drive Directly Download
description:
Welcome to Bricklandia, home of a massive open-world LEGO driving adventure . Race anywhere, play with anyone, build your dream rides, and defeat a cast of wild racing rivals for the coveted Sky Trophy
In LEGO 2K Drive, your awesome transforming vehicle gives you the freedom to speed seamlessly across riveting racetracks, off-road terrain, and open waters. Explore the vast world of Bricklandia , show off your driving skills, and build vehicles brick-by-brick Super Raft Boat Together

system_requirements.Processor: Intel®️ Core™️ Intel i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or better
